channel.title: Help meh plz :)
channel.description:
Ok, i'm trying to add special attacks to my new items but i cannot without a special attack id number when you right client the special attack (and i kind of need this for everything) I want to have it so when you right click something, it tells you the ids (like on the origanal moparscape client) I dont really know if this is in the right section (due to the fact that you cant ask questions in the client section but ahh well...) If you don't know what i'm talking about then i'll explain further...
Thank you, -Zaron

item.title: Help meh plz :)
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

That’s the special attack that you use but if youy see after the:

S P E C I A L A T T A C K there’s the: 12335); That’s the number i need and it’s usually different for each weapon so yea…

Read full topic

item.title: Help meh plz :)
item.dc:creator: @whosdr whosdr
item.description:
@whosdr wrote:

i dunno. i skimmed my client.java but only found this if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("specbar")) { sendFrame126("@yel@S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 12335); fsBar(500, 0, 12325); fsBar(500, 0, 12326); fsBar(500, 0, 12327); fsBar(500, 0, 12328); fsBar(500, 0, 12329); fsBar(500, 0, 12330); fsBar(500, 0, 12331); fsBar(500, 0, 12332); fsBar(500, 0, 12333); fsBar(500, 0, 12334); l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499); }

Read full topic
